original_text: For it is written in the Law of Moses, “You shall not muzzle an ox when it treads out the grain.” Is it for oxen that God is concerned?
korean_text: 모세의 율법에 곡식을 밟아 떠는 소에게 망을 씌우지 말라 기록하였으니 하나님께서 어찌 소들을 위하여 염려하심이냐

sentences.original_text: For it is written in the Law of Moses,

sentences.korean_translation: 너는 소의 입에 망을 씌우지 말라

sentences.original_text: when it treads out the grain.”
Is it for oxen that God is concerned?
